name: Nnamdi Azikiwe Airport Rail Station
details: This station is a key transportation hub for passengers traveling to and from the Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport in Abuja FCT.

name: Idu Rail Station
details: Idu Station is a key interchange point between Abuja's light rail system and national rail network. Built in 2018, it offers modern amenities for passengers.

name: Jere Rail Station
details: Jere is a stop on the Abuja-Kaduna railway line, providing essential services for passengers.

name: Asham Rail Station
details: A small station located in Kaduna State, serving the local community and travelers.

name: Rijana Rail Station
details: Rijana Station is situated along the Abuja-Kaduna line and offers services for local travelers.

name: Rigasa Rail Station
details: Rigasa is the main terminal for the Abuja-Kaduna railway line, offering extensive passenger facilities and modern amenities.

name: Iddo Rail Station
details: Iddo Station is one of Lagos' key railway stations, providing vital connections for the Lagos rail network.

name: Mobolaji Johnson Station (MJS)
details: Named after a former Lagos Governor, this station is located on Muritala Muhammad Way and is part of the modern Lagos rail infrastructure.

name: Babatunde Fashola Rail Station
details: A modern station located in Agege, Lagos State, providing rail services to local and regional passengers.

name: Ibadan Rail Station
details: Ibadan Rail Station connects Oyo State to the wider Nigerian rail network, offering key services to passengers traveling across the country.

name: Abeokuta Rail Station
details: Located in Abeokuta, Ogun State, this station is part of the Lagos-Ibadan railway line, providing an important stop for commuters.

name: Wole Soyinka Rail Station
details: Named after Nigerian Nobel laureate Wole Soyinka, this station is in Abeokuta and plays a key role in regional rail transport.

name: Ijoko Rail Station
details: Ijoko is a smaller station in Ogun State, offering rail services along the Lagos-Ijoko line.

name: Ujevwu Rail Station
details: A station located in Warri, Delta State, Ujevwu is part of the Warri-Itakpe rail line, providing important connections for regional passengers.

name: Itakpe Rail Station
details: Itakpe is a crucial station on the Warri-Itakpe line, offering modern passenger facilities and services.

name: Osoosun Rail Station
details: Currently under construction, Osoosun Station will serve Ogun State and expand rail connectivity in the region.

name: Kajola Rail Station
details: Kajola Station in Ogun State is part of ongoing efforts to enhance rail connectivity in southwestern Nigeria.

name: Oyingbo Rail Station
details: Oyingbo Station is one of the stations under development in Lagos State, aiming to enhance urban rail transport.

name: Marina Rail Station
details: A major hub under construction in Lagos, Marina Station will connect several key rail lines and improve passenger flow in the city.

name: Okokomaiko Rail Station
details: Located in Lagos State, Okokomaiko Station is under development as part of the Lagos rail expansion project.

name: Iju Rail Station
details: Iju Station in Lagos State is under construction and will enhance the Lagos metropolitan rail network.

name: Ikeja Rail Station
details: Ikeja Station is part of the Lagos rail modernization project, aimed at improving urban rail services.

name: Oshodi Rail Station
details: Oshodi Station is under construction in Lagos, and will serve as a key stop on the expanding rail network.

name: Mushin Rail Station
details: Mushin Station is part of the Lagos rail system upgrades, aiming to improve connectivity in the city.
